Paragraph: In these two cases , AFM height images showed similar surface morphology with fairly small phase separation , and the root-mean-square ( rms ) values for the blend films from DCB and from TCB are 0.242 and 0.306 nm , respectively.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| AFM height images |
| surface morphology |
| fairly small phase separation |
| root-mean-square (rms) values |
| blend films |
| rms values for the blend films from DCB |
| rms values for the blend films from TCB |
| 0.242 nm |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| AFM height images |
| surface morphology |
| phase separation |
| root-mean-square (rms) values |
| rms values for the blend films |

Explanation:

* "In these two cases" and "respectively" are not material properties and have been removed.
* "AFM height images showed" and "from DCB and from TCB" are descriptive phrases and have been removed.
* "similar surface morphology with fairly small phase separation" has been split into two properties: "surface morphology" and "phase separation".
